text: This is my webpage, where I showcase
myself and the work that is behind me. Enjoy!

myselfSection.heading: My self
text: Felt in love with web development. I love when nice things are functional and helpful. I'm currently working as junior frontend developer in Digital Vision where I learn new things, meet new people and apprehend new pieces of information, till my brain can’t go further.
In the meantime, I’m playing basketball and doing sports. Also, I’m searching for new sneakers, enjoy PS5 from time to me, listen to music, or read Batman comics.

heading: Bball,
nolan,
race sims
sectionWMyPhoto.text: Little about me. I do like to play basketball, so I can eat more cookies and Oreos, Whatever movie Christopher Nolan makes, it’s a must-see. And if I’m not doing any of the two activities that I’ve mentioned before I am probably channeling my inner Sir Lewis Hamilton on race simulators.

work.heading: MY WORK
work.labText: Showcase my work in my free time. Either I'm learning new things, have new ideas or I want to showcase some of my skills. If you find anything interesting or bugs, please don't hesitate and contact me. Thank you.

introduction.heading: Junior Front-end Developer
text: I’m currently working as a junior frontend developer in software agency named Digital Vision where I'm working on projects for LEGO and KIA.
My journey in IT started as 1st level support in Generali, through the software engineer in M&S in Diebold Nixdorf and finally ended in Digital Vision, where I'm working as FE dev.

introduction.heading: My Aim
text: … is to write quality code that is functional, testable, and sustainable. I’m at the start to become a good developer and I’m open to new things and opportunities that can benefit me and the others along the way.

Also, I make some basic designing/prototyping as something that comes in handy, because on some of the projects I’ve done everything by myself. Check down below that tech stack I use and other skills.

aboutMe.projects: Sadly I don’t have currently any real-work application that is normally used, just learning and creating “lab” projects to showcase my work.

myHobbies.basketball: One of my favorite hobbies to do, because it balances my life with the IT world. Currently, I’m playing for ASV Cham in Bavaria, Germany. Also, I like to watch from time to time some NBA games when there are some on schedule.
myHobbies.movies: When I want to completely switch off and just chill, I do like to play some movies rather than tv shows. One of my fav movies is 500 days of summer and everything that has a fingerprint by Christopher Nolan.
myHobbies.race sims: Another thing that allows me to get my happy hour of freedom is the racing sim. I love to play F1, Forza with the open world, or some of the serious IRacing, that has an awesome community.
myHobbies.music: I do not have a lot of addictions, but music is one of them. From rap, hip-hop through rock, and indie to electronic music like Swimming. I do listen to every genre almost possible. Mainly when working because it helps me to focus on the task.

heading: Reach
me out
footer.headingText: You can contact me either via the social links down below or write me an email via email link. Looking forward to hearing from you.
